All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractDAO<T>
This is an abstract DAO class that provides common CRUD operations for any DAO subclass.
Bill
Represents a Bill record with id, product id, and price.
BillBLL
The BillBLL class provides business logic operations for working with bills.
BillController
The BillController class controls the actions performed on the BillFrame and communicates with the BillBLL class
BillDAO
 
BillFrame
UI for bill
Client
A class representing a client in the system.
ClientBLL
The ClientBLL class represents the business logic layer of the Client entity in the application.
ClientController
The ClientController class controls the actions performed on the ClientFrame and communicates with the ClientBLL class.
ClientDAO
The ClientDAO class extends the AbstractDAO class and provides data access operations on the Client table in the database.
ClientFrame
UI for client
ConnectionFactory
 
Main
 
OrderBLL
This class represents the business logic layer for Order objects.
OrderC
Represents an order made by a client for a particular product.
OrderController
The OrderController class is responsible for controlling the order-related functionality of the application.
OrderDAO
The OrderDAO class extends the AbstractDAO class and provides data access operations on the OrderC table in the database.
OrderFrame
UI for order
OrderValidationResult
/**
OrderValidator
A functional interface for validating a OrderC object.
Product
This class represents a product in the inventory system.
ProductBLL
This class represents the business logic layer for the Product entity.
ProductController
This class is responsible for controlling the Product related functionality in the UI.
ProductDAO
The ProductDAO class extends the AbstractDAO class and provides data access operations on the Product table in the database.
ProductFrame
UI for product
ProductValidationResult
An enumeration of possible results of validating a product's price and stock.
ProductValidator
A functional interface for validating a Product object.
SinglePointAccessBLL
A utility class that provides a single point of access to the different BLL (Business Logic Layer) classes in the application.
SinglePointAccessController
The SinglePointAccessController class is responsible for instantiating and providing access to the controllers in the application.
SinglePointAccessDAO
The SinglePointAccessDAO class is responsible for providing access to the data access objects (DAOs) used in the Single Point Access application.
SinglePointAccessGUI
The SinglePointAccessGUI class provides utility methods for creating and manipulating the graphical user interface of the application.
SinglePointAccessView
The SinglePointAccessView class represents the view layer of the Single Point Access application.
StartController
This class represents a controller for the start screen of the application.
StartFrame
UI for start page
TableInsert<T>
A utility class that provides a method to insert data from a list into a JTable.
